text: interference with freedom trafficking in persons amend rsa vi a to read as follows a a victim under this section who was under years of age at the time of the offense shall not be subject to children in need of services proceedings under rsa juvenile delinquency proceeding proceedings under rsa or prosecuted for conduct chargeable as indecent exposure and lewdness under rsa prostitution under rsa or any other misdemeanor or class b felony where the conduct was committed as a direct result of being trafficked provided that the conduct chargeable did not involve an act of violence as defined in rsa
